          <title>
            <string language="en">Can crushing experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dose, die Experiment zerquetscht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bidon écrasant l'expérience</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lata que esmaga a experiência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Latta che schiaccia esperimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορέστε συντρίβοντας να πειραματιστεί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lata que machaca el experimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a can is crushed when the gas inside is removed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">can crushing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie a Dose zerquetscht 
wird, wenn das Gasinnere gelöscht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le bidon de a 
est écrasé quand l'intérieur de gaz est retiré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como a lata de a é 
esmagada quando o interior do gás é removido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come la latta di a è 
schiacciata quando la parte interna del gas è rimossa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς το α μπορεί 
συντρίβεται όταν αφαιρείται το αέριο εσωτερικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo se machaca la 
lata de a cuando se quita el interior del gas.</string>
          </description>
